local_intent: Detect cloth, align and establish gentle contact, push diagonally to fold, lift slightly, and verify folded state.
assumptions: Cloth is visible to the camera
Workspace around the cloth is clear
Gripper pose reachable for the push
coherence_with_global: Implements the push phase of the global plan: detect -> approach/align -> set yaw -> lower until contact -> push (225 deg, 0.1 m) -> lift -> verify folded cloth.
